table.name: civicrm_address
table.comment: Stores the physical street / mailing address. This format should be capable of storing ALL international addresses.

field.name: id
field.title: Address ID
field.comment: Unique Address ID

field.name: contact_id
field.title: Contact ID
field.comment: FK to Contact ID

field.name: location_type_id
field.title: Address Location Type
field.comment: Which Location does this address belong to.

field.name: is_primary
field.title: Is Address Primary?
field.comment: Is this the primary address.

field.name: is_billing
field.title: Is Billing Address
field.comment: Is this the billing address.

field.name: street_address
field.title: Street Address
field.comment: Concatenation of all routable street address components (prefix, street number, street name, suffix, unit number OR P.O. Box). Apps should be able to determine physical location with this data (for mapping, mail delivery, etc.).

field.name: street_number
field.title: Street Number
field.comment: Numeric portion of address number on the street, e.g. For 112A Main St, the street_number = 112.

field.name: street_number_suffix
field.title: Street Number Suffix
field.comment: Non-numeric portion of address number on the street, e.g. For 112A Main St, the street_number_suffix = A

field.name: street_number_predirectional
field.title: Street Direction Prefix
field.comment: Directional prefix, e.g. SE Main St, SE is the prefix.

field.name: street_name
field.title: Street Name
field.comment: Actual street name, excluding St, Dr, Rd, Ave, e.g. For 112 Main St, the street_name = Main.

field.name: street_type
field.title: Street Type
field.comment: St, Rd, Dr, etc.

field.name: street_number_postdirectional
field.title: Street Direction Suffix
field.comment: Directional prefix, e.g. Main St S, S is the suffix.

field.name: street_unit
field.title: Street Unit
field.comment: Secondary unit designator, e.g. Apt 3 or Unit # 14, or Bldg 1200

field.name: supplemental_address_1
field.title: Supplemental Address 1
field.comment: Supplemental Address Information, Line 1

field.name: supplemental_address_2
field.title: Supplemental Address 2
field.comment: Supplemental Address Information, Line 2

field.name: supplemental_address_3
field.title: Supplemental Address 3
field.comment: Supplemental Address Information, Line 3

field.name: city
field.title: City
field.comment: City, Town or Village Name.

field.name: county_id
field.title: County
field.comment: Which County does this address belong to.

field.name: state_province_id
field.title: State/Province
field.comment: Which State_Province does this address belong to.

field.name: postal_code_suffix
field.title: Postal Code Suffix
field.comment: Store the suffix, like the +4 part in the USPS system.

field.name: postal_code
field.title: Postal Code
field.comment: Store both US (zip5) AND international postal codes. App is responsible for country/region appropriate validation.

field.name: usps_adc
field.title: USPS Code
field.comment: USPS Bulk mailing code.

field.name: country_id
field.title: Country
field.comment: Which Country does this address belong to.

field.name: geo_code_1
field.title: Latitude
field.comment: Latitude

field.name: geo_code_2
field.title: Longitude
field.comment: Longitude

field.name: manual_geo_code
field.title: Is manually geocoded
field.comment: Is this a manually entered geo code

field.name: timezone
field.title: Timezone
field.comment: Timezone expressed as a UTC offset - e.g. United States CST would be written as "UTC-6".

field.name: master_id
field.title: Master Address Belongs To
field.comment: FK to Address ID
